#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int isPerfect(long long int y)
{
	long long int s=sqrt(y);
	if(s*s == y){
		return 1;
	}
	return 0;
}

int isFib(long long int N)
{
	int i = isPerfect(5*N*N +4);
	int j = isPerfect(5*N*N -4);
	if(i || j){
		return 1;
	}
	else return 0;
}

int main()
{
	long long int T;
	long long int N;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--){
		cin>>N;
		int s = isFib(N);
		if(s==1)
			cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else cout<<"No\n";
	}
}
